details.formulaStrippedArticleTitle: Direction of arrival estimation for uncorrelated and coherent signals with uniform linear array
details.title: Direction of arrival estimation for uncorrelated and coherent signals with uniform linear array
details.standardTitle: Direction of arrival estimation for uncorrelated and coherent signals with uniform linear array
details.abstract: A novel direction of arrival (DOA) estimation method is proposed with uniform linear array when uncorrelated and coherent signals coexist. The DOAs of uncorrelated signals are first estimated using a new method of modified total least squares estimation of signal parameters via rotation invariance techniques. Afterwards, the contributions of uncorrelated signals are eliminated and a new matrix is constructed based on the spatial difference matrix. Then, the coherent signals can be resolved by performing the forward spatial smoothing scheme on the new matrix. The proposed method can resolve more signals than the array elements with good performance. Simulation results demonstrate the effectiveness and efficiency of the proposed method.

ieee.displayText: Sherif I. Elsanadily, Hossam Eldin A. Badr, Zaki B. Nossair, Osama M. Elghandour, "Direction of Arrival Tracking under Various Degrees of Correlation", Multimedia and Signal Processing (CMSP) 2011 International Conference on, vol. 1, pp. 73-78, 2011.
ieee.title: Direction of Arrival Tracking under Various Degrees of Correlation

ieee.displayText: Xu Pei, Jianshu Cao, Qing Li, "An Improved Aperture and Effective Computation DOA Estimation Method Based on Covariance Differencing Technique", Computational Intelligence and Design (ISCID) 2014 Seventh International Symposium on, vol. 2, pp. 324-328, 2014.
ieee.title: An Improved Aperture and Effective Computation DOA Estimation Method Based on Covariance Differencing Technique

ieee.displayText: Jiajia Jiang, Fajie Duan, Yanchao Li, "Accurate direction-of-arrival estimation for coherent signals", Natural Computation (ICNC) 2014 10th International Conference on, pp. 888-892, 2014, ISSN 2157-9563.
ieee.title: Accurate direction-of-arrival estimation for coherent signals

ieee.displayText: Xu Xu, Zhongfu Ye, Yufeng Zhang, "DOA Estimation for Mixed Signals in the Presence of Mutual Coupling", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 57, pp. 3523-3532, 2009, ISSN 1053-587X.
ieee.title: DOA Estimation for Mixed Signals in the Presence of Mutual Coupling

ieee.displayText: Leonardo Lizzi, Giacomo Oliveri, Paolo Rocca, Andrea Massa, "Estimation of the Directions-of-Arrival of correlated signals by means of a SVM-based multi-resolution approach", Antennas and Propagation Society International Symposium (APSURSI) 2010 IEEE, pp. 1-4, 2010, ISSN 1522-3965.
ieee.title: Estimation of the Directions-of-Arrival of correlated signals by means of a SVM-based multi-resolution approach

ieee.displayText: Hao Tao, Jingmin Xin, Jiasong Wang, Nanning Zheng, Akira Sano, "Two-Dimensional Direction Estimation for a Mixture of Noncoherent and Coherent Signals", Signal Processing IEEE Transactions on, vol. 63, pp. 318-333, 2015, ISSN 1053-587X.
ieee.title: Two-Dimensional Direction Estimation for a Mixture of Noncoherent and Coherent Signals
